bridge_password.description: the password used for a conference bridge

bridge_username.description: the username used for a conference bridge

conference_numbers.description: Defines conference numbers that can be used by members or moderators

focus.description: This is a read-only property indicating the media server hosting the conference

language.description: Prompt language to play in the conference

max_members_media.description: Media to play when the conference is full

max_participants.description: The maximum number of participants that can join

member.description: Defines the discovery (call in) properties for a member

join_deaf.description: Determines if a member will join deaf

join_muted.description: Determines if a member will join muted

numbers.description: Defines the conference (call in) number(s) for members

pins.description: Defines the pin number(s) for members

play_entry_prompt.description: Whether to play the entry prompt on member join

moderator.description: Defines the discovery (call in) properties for a moderator

join_deaf.description: Determines if a moderator will join deaf

join_muted.description: Determines if a moderator will join muted

numbers.description: Defines the conference (call in) number(s) for moderators

pins.description: Defines the pin number(s) for moderators

moderator_controls.description: profile on the switch for controlling the conference as a moderator

name.description: A friendly name for the conference

owner_id.description: The user ID who manages this conference

play_entry_tone.description: Whether to play an entry tone, or the entry tone to play

play_exit_tone.description: Whether to play an exit tone, or the exit tone to play

play_name.description: Do we need to announce new conference members?

play_welcome.description: Whether to play the welcome prompt

require_moderator.description: does the conference require a moderator

wait_for_moderator.description: should members wait for a moderator before joining the conference
